Body: Description: Hi Support Team, SK D&D, one of our clients, requires a new EPP deployment on AWS. Based on the details provided below, please kindly proceed with uploading the necessary AMI and inform us upon completion. Once the AMI has been successfully deployed, two modifications are required to adapt it for the Korean market: 1. Change the license type to legacy. 2. Optimize the HDD size. [AWS Info] - Name of customer: skdnd - Customer's email: jckim9583@sk.com - Phone Number: +82 10 4200 9583 - AWS Account No.: 315198441972 - Region and Availability: Seoul & ap-northeast-2 - IP: 43.201.170.164 - AWS Option: c5.4xlarge - Storage Size: 1.8TB It is also attached this info. Have a nice day! Thank you for your support. Best Regards, Jack Jung
